name: lyquidity/xpath2-tests
description: Provides a harness to test XPath 2.0 statement execution library for PHP using the XQTS 1.0.3 conformance test suite

suggest.lyquidity/xpath2-test: Download the XQTS 1.0.3 conformance suite package from https://dev.w3.org/2006/xquery-test-suite/PublicPagesStagingArea/XQTS_1_0_3.zip the uzip it and set the $xxx variable to the unzip location
